Class BinaryTree<E>

java.lang.Object
BinaryTree<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinarySearchTree
public class BinaryTree<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class for a binary tree that stores type E objects
Author:
Koffman and Wolfgang
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    BinaryTree()  
    BinaryTree​(E data, BinaryTree<E> leftTree, BinaryTree<E> rightTree)
    Constructs a new binary tree with data in its root, leftTree as its left subtree, and rightTree as its right subtree

    • BinaryTree

      public BinaryTree​(E data, BinaryTree<E> leftTree, BinaryTree<E> rightTree)
      Constructs a new binary tree with data in its root, leftTree as its left subtree, and rightTree as its right subtree
      Parameters:
      data - The data of the root node
      leftTree - The left subtree
      rightTree - The right subtree

  • Method Details

    • getLeftTree

      public BinaryTree<E> getLeftTree()
      Return the left subtree
      Returns:
      The left subtree or null if either the root or the left subtree is null

    • getRightSubtree

      public BinaryTree<E> getRightSubtree()
      Return the right subtree.
      Returns:
      The right subtree or null if either the root or the right subtree is null

    • isLeaf

      public boolean isLeaf()
      Determine whether this tree is a leaf.
      Returns:
      true if the root has no children

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • oneLineInorder

      public java.lang.String oneLineInorder()

    • readBinaryTree

      public static BinaryTree<java.lang.String> readBinaryTree​(java.util.Scanner scan)
      Method to read a binary tree pre: The input consists of a preorder traversal of the binary tree. The line "null" indicates a null tree.
      Parameters:
      scan - the Scanner attached to the input file.
      Returns:
      The binary tree
